body.name: For Once in My Life: An absolutely perfect laugh out loud romantic comedy

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Started a bit slow but it got going with great surprise. Not as funny as heartwarming, eye opening! Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Captivating and heartwarming
reviews.reviewText: For Once in My Life is a captivating and heartwarming tale that explores the power of love, resilience, and second chances. The plot is filled with unexpected twists and turns, keeping you on the edge of your seat and eager to uncover what happens next. The relationships between the characters are beautifully portrayed, showcasing the power of friendship, love, and forgiveness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Reviews don’t match what I read
reviews.reviewText: The reviews of this book set me up for antipating a good read on a cold winter day. I snuggled In my favorite chair with my blanket and had a hot cup of cider at my side Unfortunately, I never found the humor. No laughs from me. It was okay but I would not necessarily recommend it to someone. I could empathize with Lily’s situation and was hoping for. . . Oh, I don’t know. Something to see humor in? But the storyline was predictable and I foretold the ending.Does anyone read the book before it is classified under romance and humor? Maybe the reviews for this book got attached to the wrong book

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Story of a Turning Point in a Woman’s Life
reviews.reviewText: This is a beautiful story about a woman who is left at the alter on her wedding day, and chooses to take charge of her life, so that she will never again fall prey to going along with another persons expectations of her. Three years later she is still shaken, not because she missed her fiancé, but because the event left her doubting her own ability to make competent life decisions. I so identified with the way a little encouragement at her workplace catapulted her to reveal the inspired and creative talent that she had always surpressed. I thoroughly enjoyed every minute of this story.....Lily’s character was vulnerable and had me cheering for a happy conclusion. Beautiful story, well written and memorable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A laugh out loud uplifting story!
reviews.reviewText: The reader gets the rare opportunity to follow an "investigative reporter" as she gathers material for her newspaper columns participating in adventures which she describes to her readers. Having studied journalism to become a reporter for a major newspaper, our reporter, Lily, is instead with a tiny little village weekly where she writes about squash and the like. With a shakeup in management, she becomes insstead the tool of the new editor who wants to boost subscriptions by having Lily go on rare and daredevil adventures and then inspire her readers as she challenges them. Never having been an outgoing person, Lily finds herself booked onto adventures such as hot air ballooning and feeling that she is risking her life for her trade. The editor is quite supportive even though he books her into amazing things. He is quite reserved and not at all a risk taker himself, but lets her know that he expects her to be. The ensuring adventures will have you giggling and laughing out loud as you read. This is a rollicking, feel-good read that will leave you refreshed and happy with your own life. Read, it. You will love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good light read
reviews.reviewText: Great uplifting light read book. Fun characters and gives hope and inspiration.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I loved every page of this book. The story is so captivating and entertaining. Lily is dumped at the altar. From that moment on she is unsure of herself. When her job is in jeopardy, she knows she needs to save it. Not just her job but everyone's job . She can't let them close down the local newspaper. In comes Christopher, a man who is supposed to help transition the newspaper from a loser to a winner. He does so much more. Great story. Beautiful ending. Excellent writing. I just loved it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Funny, happy book.
reviews.reviewText: I did enjoy this book. The characters were interesting, humorous and touching. It is always interesting how some situations mirror things in your own life. Anyway it was a good book.

reviews.reviewTitle: If you’re currently struggling this is the read!
reviews.reviewText: At the moment I’m going through probably the deepest spiral I’ve ever experienced. I’ve never felt so out of control and afraid of the unknown. I used to read constantly, couldn’t catch me without a book but it’s been years now that I haven’t bothered to get into anything and have dropped my hobby. This book was the perfect door back into reading it’s a light read and nothing dramatic or overly extravagant but it’s relatable, comforting and cute. It’s helped put me in a new mindset and re kindled my love for books.
really enjoyed this book, couldnt put it down and didnt want it to end.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 15, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: Heart-warming read with laughs and wit
reviews.reviewText: I thoroughly enjoyed this book. Genuinely laugh out loud in places and filled with wry observations about life and love, I found this tale about one woman's quest to push beyond her 'safe' zone to help save a struggling regional paper an uplifting antidote for stressful times. I think most people will relate to the central message that sometimes you have to face your fears if you want to get what you really need and, whilst romantic comedy is not everyone's cup of tea, I found the warmth and gentle tone throughout made a revitalising tonic one cold, dark weekend.

reviews.reviewTitle: Peak into possibility and a journey of self discovery
reviews.reviewText: Enjoyable journey into the life and challenges overcome by believing in oneself.Easy to get lost in, laugh and feel the emotions of Evelyn's story

I think everybody has fears in their life and this book addresses some of the fears that Lily has and how she overcomes them, falling in love along the way. I stayed up way too late reading this but left the finale for today. I would definitely read other books by this author. Now, off to work on my bucket list!
